isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 5000 9100 9200 9400 9900 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS - 5000, 5000i, 9000, 9000i - DESCRIPTION - PROGRAMMING

svcproc.title: PROGRAMMING
svcproc.para: The Speedometer/Tachometer module can be programmed by using the DIP switches or with an EZ-Tech® or Pro-Link 9000® electronic service tool (EST) connected to the data link with electronic engines. The module is programmed electronically at the factory and all DIP switches are physically in the zero position. The actual settings are on the vehicle lineset ticket or can be viewed using the EZ-Tech® or Pro-Link 9000® EST. Refer to PROGRAMMING for additional programming information.
